description: This innovative product combines interactive video and a full-color printed reference to explain everything a beginner needs to know to create a blog from scratch using WordPress. Experienced instructor Joe Chellman presents 4.5 hours of exceptional quality video tutorials, complete with lesson files, assessment quizzes, and review materials Project files used in the lessons are included so viewers can practice what they've learned, and interactive review questions help reinforce freshly gained knowledge.
title: Introducing WordPress
